name: Lucid Dreams
description:
This project is about expressing life in its purest form: abstract and mutable. These are dreams, fears, and experiences translated into colors and put on canvas.

From the series Experiments, Experiment #9 is about Lucid Dreams. "Sometimes IDK if I am awake or dreaming, all I know is that I see things that You may fear."
Oil and oil pastel on Strathmore paper. 2021.
